posts.post_content:
It would be bad if it was vanilla.
  
   
But honestly, it's just wrongly designed. A giant, cast-iron tank with a built in laser cannon and... that's all it does? Rubbish. I demand one-sided WOGs and free card draw and pudding for a contraption this badass.

posts.post_content:
@Superllama12, old artifact creatures were printed without creature types. Then they later decided that all creatures (well, except for [Nameless Race](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Nameless Race)) should have creature types, artifact or not, and went back and added creature types to the old artifact creatures. If you look at the "details" tab, you'll see that this is officially considered a Juggernaut.  
  
Speaking of which, that should have given them some ideas for how to make this card better.
posts.html:
@Superllama12, old artifact creatures were printed without creature types. Then they later decided that all creatures (well, except for Nameless Race) should have creature types, artifact or not, and went back and added creature types to the old artifact creatures. If you look at the "details" tab, you'll see that this is officially considered a Juggernaut.

Speaking of which, that should have given them some ideas for how to make this card better.
